1.Name: Adhere
1.Description: An object is covered in extremely sticky slime.
1.Personality: Adjacent objects stick to the book with great force.

2.Name: Anchor
2.Description: A strong wire sprouts from your arms, affixing itself to two points within 50ft on each side.
2.Personality: If a rope is pulled through the iron loop on its spine, it becomes as heavy as an elephant.

3.Name: Animate Object
3.Description: An object obeys your commands as best it can.
3.Personality: Moldable like clay. Childish laughter sprouts from its pages.

4.Name: Anthropomorphize
4.Description: An animal either gains human intelligence or human appearance for one day.
4.Personality: Whimpers, purrs and growls depending on its treatment.

5.Name: Arcane Eye
5.Description: You can see through a magical floating eyeball that flies around at your command.
5.Personality: Needs a spritz of water to open.

6.Name: Astral Prison
6.Description: An object is frozen in time and space within an invulnerable crystal shell.
6.Personality: Silent, abstract, faces scream in anguish within.

7.Name: Attract
7.Description: Two objects are strongly magnetically attracted to each other if they come within 10 feet.

8.Name: Auditory Illusion
8.Description: You create illusory sounds that seem to come from a direction of your choice.
8.Personality: Produces random and occasionally inopportune sounds throughout the day.

9.Name: Babble
9.Description: A creature must loudly and clearly repeat everything you think. It is otherwise mute.
9.Personality: When the text is read aloud, the words of others become unintelligible.

10.Name: Bait Flower
10.Description: A plant sprouts from the ground that emanates the smell of decaying flesh.

11.Name: Beast Form
11.Description: You and your possessions transform into a mundane animal.
11.Personality: Covered in thick fur, its edges lined with small teeth.

12.Name: Befuddle
12.Description: A creature of your choice is unable to form new short-term memories for the duration of the spell.
12.Personality: Its contents shift and change each time it is opened.

13.Name: Body Swap
13.Description: You switch bodies with a creature you touch. If one body dies, the other dies as well.
13.Personality: The front cover shows an image of the last creature to read it.

14.Name: Charm
14.Description: A creature you can see treats you as a friend.
14.Personality: Warm to the touch, and smells of roses.

15.Name: Command
15.Description: A target obeys a single three-word command that does not cause it harm.
15.Personality: Grows thinner over time, until finally disappearing forever.

16.Name: Comprehend
16.Description: You become fluent in all languages for a short while.
16.Personality: Drips letters, staining whatever it touches.

17.Name: Cone of Foam
17.Description: Dense foam sprays from your hand, coating the target.
17.Personality: Spongy and moist with a soapy residue.

18.Name: Control Plants
18.Description: Nearby plants and trees obey you and gain the ability to move at a slow pace.
18.Personality: Leaves grow along the spine, and it smells faintly of decay.

19.Name: Control Weather
19.Description: You may alter the type of weather at will, but you do not otherwise control it.
19.Personality: Highly resistant to fire and water damage.

20.Name: Cure Wounds
20.Description: Restore 1d4 STR per day to a creature you can touch.
20.Personality: Smells of vinegar and thyme. Turns red after use.

21.Name: Deafen
21.Personality: Nearby instruments occasionally sound off, as if in protest.

22.Name: Detect Magic
22.Description: You can see or hear nearby magical auras.
22.Personality: Becomes warm to the touch if magic is used nearby.

23.Name: Disassemble
23.Description: Any of your body parts may be detached and reattached at will, without causing pain or damage. You can still control them.
23.Personality: Regenerates any torn or defaced pages.

24.Name: Disguise
24.Description: You may alter the appearance of one character at will as long as they remain humanoid. Attempts to duplicate other characters will seem uncanny.
24.Personality: The surface makes a perfect mirror.

25.Name: Displace
25.Description: An object appears to be up to 15ft from its actual position.
25.Personality: Bits of string, clothing, and leaves are sometimes stuffed inside.

26.Name: Earthquake
26.Description: The ground begins shaking violently. Structures may be damaged or collapse.
26.Personality: Sand dribbles from the corners, seemingly without stop.

27.Name: Elasticity
27.Description: Your body can stretch up to 10ft.
27.Personality: Smells of taffy, and is very flexible.

28.Name: Elemental Wall
28.Description: A straight wall of ice or fire 50ft long and 10ft high rises from the ground.
28.Personality: Skin and warmer substances stick to it after use.

29.Name: Filch
29.Description: A visible item teleports to your hands.
29.Personality: An ally's prized possession may occasionally be found tucked between its covers.

30.Name: Flare
30.Description: A bright ball of energy fires a trail of light into the sky, revealing your location to friend or foe.

31.Name: Fog Cloud
31.Description: A dense fog spreads out from you.
31.Personality: When submersed in water, the book eventually turns all the liquid to vapor.

32.Name: Frenzy
32.Description: A nearby creature erupts in a frenzy of violence.
32.Personality: Rough, sandpaper cover that destroys any book it touches.

33.Name: Gate
33.Description: A portal to a random plane opens.
33.Personality: A large hole is carved into the center, ending in a void. Items dropped within are never seen again.

34.Name: Gravity Shift
34.Description: You can change the direction of gravity, but only for yourself.
34.Personality: Attaches itself to the largest object nearby.

35.Name: Greed
35.Description: A creature develops the overwhelming urge to possess a visible item of your choice.
35.Personality: The cover changes depending on the owner, subtly hinting at their deepest desires.

36.Name: Haste
36.Personality: Pages flip wildly while open. Can cause paper cuts.

37.Name: Hatred
37.Description: A creature develops a deep hatred of another creature or group and wishes to destroy them.
37.Personality: Long term exposure to the book can cause suspicion, paranoia and distrust of others.

38.Name: Hear Whispers
38.Description: You can hear faint sounds clearly.
38.Personality: The reader's voice is amplified for a short period of time afterwards.

39.Name: Hover
39.Description: An object hovers, frictionless, 2ft above the ground. It can hold up to one humanoid.

40.Name: Hypnotize
40.Description: A creature enters a trance and will truthfully answer one yes or no question you ask it.
40.Personality: Eye-catching, swirling spirals don its covers.

41.Name: Icy Touch
41.Description: A thick ice layer spreads across a touched surface, up to 10ft in radius.

42.Name: Identify Owner
42.Description: Letters appear over the object you touch, spelling out the name of the object’s owners, if there are any.
42.Personality: The book's interior lists the name of its previous owner.

43.Name: Illuminate
43.Description: A floating light moves as you command.
43.Personality: When held in light, the pages become a prism of vibrant rainbows.

44.Name: Invisible Tether
44.Description: Two objects within 10ft of each other cannot be moved more than 10ft apart.
44.Personality: Its pages are not attached by glue or thread, yet stay together nonetheless.

45.Name: Knock
45.Description: A nearby mundane or magical lock unlocks loudly.
45.Personality: Locked. A new owner 'produces' the key after their next meal.

46.Name: Leap
46.Description: You jump up to 10ft high, once.
46.Personality: When thrown, it just keeps going.

47.Name: Liquid Air
47.Description: The air around you becomes swimmable.
47.Personality: Floats of its own volition, bouncing off of whatever it touches.

48.Name: Magic Dampener
48.Description: All nearby magical effects have their effectiveness halved.
48.Personality: Relics within 100ft of the spellbook cannot be recharged.

49.Name: Manse
49.Description: A sturdy, furnished cottage appears for hours. You can permit and forbid entry to it at will.
49.Personality: If left inside, both the book and the cottage vanish forever.

50.Name: Marble Craze
50.Description: Your pockets are full of marbles and will refill every 30 seconds.
50.Personality: When jostled, makes a playful rattling sound.

51.Name: Masquerade
51.Description: A character's appearance and voice becomes identical to those of a character you touch.
51.Personality: Extended use causes the owner to develop unconscious yet noticeable tics.

52.Name: Miniaturize
52.Description: A creature you touch is shrunk down to the size of a mouse.
52.Personality: The text is ludicrously, comically large.

53.Name: Mirror Image
53.Description: An illusory duplicate of yourself appears and is under your control.
53.Personality: Over time, the owner begins to question who is the original, and who is the duplicate.

54.Name: Mirrorwalk
54.Description: A mirror becomes a gateway to another mirror that you looked into today.
54.Personality: Will not open unless the owner politely knocks on the cover.

55.Name: Multiarm
55.Description: You temporarily gain an extra arm.
55.Personality: After use, the caster is wracked with phantom limb syndrome for a day.

56.Name: Night Sphere
56.Description: A 50ft-wide sphere of darkness displaying the night sky appears before you.
56.Personality: Displays a prominent constellation on its cover.

57.Name: Objectify
57.Description: You become any inanimate object between the size of a grand piano and an apple.
57.Personality: The owner experiences intense pareidolia for days after use.

58.Name: Ooze Form
58.Personality: Slowly drips an acid that eventually eats away anything it touches.

59.Name: Pacify
59.Description: A creature near you has an aversion to violence.
59.Personality: Smells of jasmine and incense. Attracts children.

60.Name: Phobia
60.Description: A nearby creature becomes terrified of an object of your choice.
60.Personality: Over time, haunting, abstract art begins to fill its pages.

61.Name: Pit
61.Description: A pit 10ft wide and 10ft deep opens in the ground.
61.Personality: A standard piton can be safely stored in its spine.

62.Name: Primal Surge
62.Description: A creature rapidly evolves into a future version of its species.
62.Personality: The owner is haunted by strange visions of their own ancestors.

63.Name: Push/Pull
63.Description: An object of any size is pulled directly towards you or pushed directly away from you with the strength of one man.
63.Personality: Any force against the book is comically amplified.

64.Name: Raise Dead
64.Description: A skeleton rises from the ground to serve you. They are incredibly stupid and can only obey simple orders.
64.Personality: The owner becomes more and more fascinated with bones after each use.

65.Name: Raise Spirit
65.Description: The spirit of a nearby corpse manifests and will answer 1 question.
65.Personality: The answers (but not their questions) are forever inscribed in its pages.

66.Name: Read Mind
66.Description: You can hear the surface thoughts of nearby creatures.
66.Personality: Long-term possession can cause the reader to mistake the thoughts of others as their own.

67.Name: Repel
67.Description: Two objects are strongly magnetically repelled from each other within 10 feet.
67.Personality: Closed by two powerful straps that spring open at inopportune times.

68.Name: Scry
68.Description: You can see through the eyes of a creature you touched earlier today.
68.Personality: The owner's eyes turn milky-white for an hour after use.

69.Name: Sculpt Elements
69.Description: Inanimate material behaves like clay in your hands.
69.Personality: Slowly decays on contact with wood or cloth. Bury in dirt or submerge in water to refresh.

70.Name: Sense
70.Description: Choose one kind of object (key, gold, arrow, jug, etc). You can sense the nearest example.
70.Personality: The book's previous owner is always aware of the book's current location.

71.Name: Shield
71.Description: A creature you touch is protected from mundane attacks for one minute.
71.Personality: Bound in rusty ring-mail and is quite heavy. If held, provides +1 Armor.

72.Name: Shroud
72.Description: A creature you touch is invisible until they move.
72.Personality: Invisible to any but the book's current owner.

73.Name: Shuffle
73.Description: Two creatures you can see instantly switch places.
73.Personality: If stolen but not yet read, it reappears wherever its owner last left it.

74.Name: Sleep
74.Description: A creature you can see falls into a light sleep.
74.Personality: Soft as a pillow, but yields only fitful sleep.

75.Name: Slick
75.Description: Every surface in a 30ft radius becomes extremely slippery.
75.Personality: Gloves are required for handling, lest the book is dropped in a most comical fashion.

76.Name: Smoke Form
76.Description: Your body becomes a living smoke that you can control.
76.Personality: Smells of campfire. The pages cannot be burnt, but are very sensitive to moisture.

77.Name: Sniff
77.Description: You can smell even the faintest traces of scents.
77.Personality: Expresses a strong odor detectable only by its owner.

78.Name: Snuff
78.Description: The source of any mundane light you can see is instantly snuffed out.
78.Personality: If left in one place for long periods, nearby light sources eventually dim, then finally go out.

79.Name: Sort
79.Description: Inanimate items sort themselves according to categories you set.
79.Personality: Rights itself when dropped or thrown.

80.Name: Skillful Repair
80.Description: You make minor repairs to a nonliving object.
80.Personality: Sewn from the vellum of one hundred books, no two pages are alike.

81.Name: Spellsaw
81.Description: A whirling blade flies from your chest, clearing any plant material in its way. It is otherwise harmless.
81.Personality: Wrapped in stained leather, it should be oiled at least once a month.

82.Name: Spider Climb
82.Description: You can climb surfaces like a spider.
82.Personality: New cobwebs must be pushed aside prior to each use. They are hard to remove.

83.Name: Fish Lung
83.Description: A target can breathe underwater until they surface again.
83.Personality: Smells strongly of the sea. Attracts wild animals.

84.Name: Swarm
84.Description: You become a swarm of crows, rats, or piranhas. You can only be harmed by blast attacks.
84.Personality: Easily broken into a dozen distinct parts that slowly move towards one another over time.

85.Name: Telekinesis
85.Description: You may mentally 1 move item under 60lbs.
85.Personality: The owner can summon the book through mental command alone (WIL save or become deprived afterwards).

86.Name: Telepathy
86.Description: Two creatures can hear each other’s thoughts, no matter how far apart.
86.Personality: The holder can hear (but not respond) to the thoughts of whoever last possessed it, and vice versa.

87.Name: Teleport
87.Description: An object or person you can see is transported from one place to another in a 50ft radius.
87.Personality: Can be destroyed to create a portal to another dimension.

88.Name: Target Lure
88.Description: An object you touch becomes the target of any nearby spell.
88.Personality: Attracts all manner of magical creatures, spell leaks, and scrying.

89.Name: Thicket
89.Description: A thicket of trees and dense brush up to 50ft wide suddenly sprouts up.
89.Personality: Wrapped in vines that must be destroyed again with each use.

90.Name: Passage
90.Description: Creates a temporary path through wood, stone or brick.
90.Personality: An object dropped on top of the book inevitably falls through the other side.

91.Name: Time Control
91.Description: Time in a 50ft bubble slows down or increases by 10% for 30 seconds.
91.Personality: Alternates its appearance as either impossibly old or freshly written.

92.Name: True Sight
92.Description: You see through all nearby illusions.
92.Personality: Cannot be concealed by magic, and sticks out like a sore thumb.

93.Name: Upwell
93.Personality: Hardened leather bindings caked in salt and living barnacles.

94.Name: Vision
94.Description: You completely control what a creature sees.
94.Personality: An unnerving, lidless eye graces the front cover.

95.Name: Visual Illusion
95.Description: A silent, immobile, room-sized illusion of your choice appears.
95.Personality: Filled with rich, colorful pages very much like a children's bedtime story.

96.Name: Ward
96.Description: A silver circle 50ft across appears on the ground. Choose one species that cannot cross it.
96.Personality: The covers are decorated with bizarre, otherworldly creatures with thousands of eyes.

97.Name: Web
97.Personality: The text is alien, yet somehow intelligible, for it is the language of dreams.

98.Name: Widget
98.Description: A primitive version of a drawn tool or item appears before you and disappears after a short time.
98.Personality: Smells of iron and rust, sweat and effort. Faint sounds of harsh labor emanate from deep within its pages.

99.Name: Wizard Mark
99.Description: Your finger can shoot a stream of ulfire-colored paint. This paint is only visible to you and can be seen at any distance, even through solid objects.
99.Personality: Inside the front cover is a small pocket containing a thin pad of paper, listing the name and date of death of all previous owners.

100.Name: X-Ray Vision
100.Description: You can see through walls, dirt, clothing, etc.
100.Personality: Long-term exposure can cause hair loss, blurry vision, and fatigue.
